CODIF_DATA.AA_AUTHORITY_TYPE: Ministry or any other national or federal authority
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Investment Bank, European Investment Fund, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BI302

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: ЕИБ - Осигуряване и доставка на противопожарни коли за летището и разнородно спасително оборудване
EIB - Dodání letištních požárních automobilů a různých záchranných prostředků
EIB - Indkøb og levering af lufthavnsbrandbiler og diverse redningsudstyr
EIB - Lieferung von Flughafenlöschfahrzeugen und diverser Rettungsausrüstung
ΕΤΕπ - Προμήθεια και παράδοση πυροσβεστικών οχημάτων αεροδρομίου και του συναφούς διασωστικού εξοπλισμού
EIB - Supply and delivery of airport fire fighting vehicles and assorted rescue equipment
BEI - Suministro y entrega de vehículos contra incendios aeroportuarios y de los equipos de salvamento correspondientes
EIP - Indkøb og levering af lufthavnsbrandbiler og diverse redningsudstyr
EIP - Lentokentän palontorjunta-ajoneuvojen ja erilaisten pelastuslaitteiden hankinta ja toimitus
BEI - Fourniture et livraison de véhicules aéroportuaires de lutte contre les incendies et des équipements de sauvetage correspondants
BEI - Supply and delivery of airport fire fighting vehicles and assorted rescue equipment
EIB - Nabava i isporuka aerodromskih vatrogasnih vozila i razne opreme za spašavanje
EBB - Repülőtéri tűzoltó járművek és meghatározott mentőeszközök beszerzése és leszállítása
BEI - Fornitura e consegna di veicoli antincendio aeroportuali e di equipaggiamenti di soccorso correlati
EIB - Oro uosto gaisrų gesinimo transporto priemonių ir įvairios gelbėjimo įrangos tiekimas ir pristatymas
EIB - Lidostas ugunsdzēsības automobiļu un dažāda glābšanas aprīkojuma sagāde un piegāde
BEI - Provvista u kunsinna ta’ vetturi għal kontra n-nar fl-ajruporti u tagħmir varju ta’ salvataġġ
EIB - Levering en bezorging van luchthavenbrandweerwagens en diverse reddingsuitrusting
EBI - Dostawa i dostarczenie lotniskowych pojazdów ratowniczo-gaśniczych i powiązanego sprzętu ratowniczego
BEI - Fornecimento e entrega de veículos de combate a incêndios em aeroportos e equipamento de resgate variado
BEI - Furnizarea și livrarea de vehicule de stingere a incendiilor și de echipamente de salvare diverse pentru aeroporturi
EIB - Dodávka a doručenie letiskových požiarnych vozidiel a rôzneho záchranného vybavenia
EIB - Dobava in dostava letaliških vozil za gašenje požarov in različne reševalne opreme
EIB - Tillhandahållande och leverans av fordon för brandbekämpning samt diverse räddningsutrustning

TI_DOC.P: EIB - Supply and delivery of airport fire fighting vehicles and assorted rescue equipment (PL-Zamosc)

STI_DOC.P: Government of the Republic of Malawi

CONTENTS.P: CONTRACT: MLW/DCA/EIB/002/2016 — Supply and delivery of Airport fire fighting vehicles and assorted rescue equipment under project for upgrade of essential aviation safety and security equipment:
Lot 1 — 4 major airport fire fighting vehicles
Lot 2 — 1 medium airport fire fighting vehicle
Lot 4 — Assorted airport rescue and fire fighting equipment
Project for upgrade of essential aviation safety and security equipment
Publication date of the procurement notice: (OJEU) 1.10.2016
MLW/DCA/EIB/002/2016- Supply and Delivery of Airport Fire Fighting Vehicles and Assorted Rescue Equipment under Project for Upgrade of Essential Aviation Safety and Security Equipment:
Lot 1 — 4 major airport fire fighting vehicles
Lot 2 — 1 medium airport fire fighting vehicle
Lot 4 — Assorted airport rescue and fire fighting equipment
Reference of the bank financing: European Investment Bank FI No.84055
Lot 1 — Supply and delivery of 4 major airport fire fighting vehicles
Lot 2 — Supply and delivery of 1 medium airport fire fighting
Lot 3 — Supply and delivery of 2 airport ambulances, 359 895.00 EUR
Lot 4 — Supply and delivery of assorted airport rescue and fire fighting
Name and address of successful tenderer for Lot 1:
Name and Address of successful Tenderer for Lot 2:
Name and Address of successful Tenderer for Lot 3:
Name and Address of successful Tenderer for Lot 4:
